polimi.reds.broker.overlay
Class AbstractTopologyManager

java.lang.Object
  polimi.reds.broker.overlay.AbstractTopologyManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectivityChangeListener, DataListener, TopologyManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleTopologyManager
public abstract class AbstractTopologyManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements TopologyManager, DataListener

An abstract topology manager providing the methods common to all topology managers. When a new transport is added, this abstract topology manager adds itself as a listener for all the events (adding/removing/crashing of links + new data available) notified by the tranport. Similarly, when the transport is removed, this abstract topology manager unregisters.

addNeighborhoodChangeListener

public void addNeighborhoodChangeListener(NeighborhoodChangeListener listener)
Description copied from interface: TopologyManager
Registers a listener for neighborhood changes. Registers a listener for the events of adding/removing/crashing of neighbors. If the listener (i.e., a listener that equals this one) was added before this operation has no effect.

Specified by:
addNeighborhoodChangeListener in interface TopologyManager
Parameters:
listener - the listener to add.

getSubjectsToListenFor

protected abstract java.lang.String[] getSubjectsToListenFor()
Subclasses must implement this method to inform this abstract topology manager about the set of subjects of data it is interested to receive from the transports connected.

Returns:
the set of subjects to listen for (from transports connected to this topology manager).
